courseDescription:
MS Word 2021 allows you to write and produce documents on your PC, edit them, exchange comments, generate stunning cover letters and collaborate on projects. We will begin by studying the layout of Word 2021, including the ‘start’ screen. In addition, you can explore its main functions by creating a document using Word 2021 and saving it. Before exploring the keyboard shortcuts, we will demonstrate the benefits of checking your spelling in Word 2021.

The course then explores the roles and duties of using Word templates. It will teach you to analyse information in order to edit existing documents. Finally, we will help you investigate the theories and practical ways you can find tools in Word 2021. We will research applying basic formatting and the use of entering text. This course will also examine making selections and advanced text formatting. It will help you answer questions like ‘what are the benefits of using the ‘dark mode’?’ or ‘what is advanced text formatting?’.

This course will teach you how to use Word 2021 to build a document. We give precise functions and essential foundations so you can confidently use them in your workplace. This course is ideal for getting started with Word 2021. So enrol right now and study the essentials of using this program.
